title: Ultimate Disney Trivia Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of all things Disney with this ultimate trivia quiz! From classic animated films to theme park secrets, see how much of a Disney fan you really are!

questions.question: What was the first feature-length animated movie ever released by Disney?
questions.answer: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
